name: 18th Hole
overview: Unlike other golf games you cannot hit over the trees, this means you have to negotiate your ball around the sometimes maze like courses!. Avoid bunkers and Water hazards. Precise shots can be taken from the fairway without disturbance to the power and direction of your ball.Hitting from the rough, may alter slightly the power and direction. Get to the green and sink the ball in the least amounts of shots.
